properties.entry: SELECT SALE_NO , SALE_PRICE , SALE_NAME , SALE_ENROLL_DATE , SALE_CONDITION , SALE_STATUS , SALE_SIZE , SALE_CATEGORY , SALE_PERIOD , PR_IMG_URL || PR_CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM SALE S JOIN P_IMG USING(PR_NO) WHERE S.MEM_USER_NO = ?

SELECT SALE_PRICE , SALE_NAME , SALE_ENROLL_DATE , SALE_CONDITION , SALE_STATUS , SALE_SIZE , SALE_CATEGORY , SALE_PERIOD , PR_COLOR , PR_IMG_URL || PR_CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM SALE JOIN P_IMG USING(PR_NO) JOIN P_REG USING(PR_NO) WHERE SALE_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_USER_ID , BID_PRICE , BID_DATE FROM BID JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_USER_NO) WHERE SALE_NO = ?
